title: Old Mates Pinot Noir
description: Floral and flirty, this Pinot Noir seriously overdelivers. From a single vineyard in Stellenbosch, it offers ripe red berries, white pepper, bright acidity, and fine tannins. Soft and juicy, it drinks beautifully both chilled and at room temperature.

title: Funkstille 'Skin Contact'
description: A perfect ‘gateway’ orange wine. Packed with tropical notes: peach, apricot, and ginger. Funkstille means 'radio silence' — a nod to calm, mindful winemaking from sustainable vineyards.

title: Domaine Gayda 'Sphère'
description: Bold expression of Languedoc terroir — blue fruits, black olives, and pepper with firm tannins. Blends tradition with modern flair.

title: Jauma 'Origins' Skin Contact
description: Rare skin-contact Arneis with marmalade, pear, and peach. Wild and intuitive winemaking with zero additions.

title: Cobaw Ridge 'Pyrenees' Rosé
description: Serious Syrah rosé fermented in oak and amphora. Notes of grapefruit, cherry stem, and bitter herbs. Zesty and full of personality.

title: Vino Friendo 'Rosato'
description: Rosé with personality. Blood orange, tomato juice, and a funky, yeasty edge. Light but zippy and fresh.

title: Billy Button 'Col Fondo'
description: Unfiltered fizz with white flowers, ripe apple, and yeasty complexity. A playful twist on classic Prosecco.

title: Sèt e Mèz Pét Nat Rosé
description: Bright, fruit-forward Pét Nat with wild strawberry and vermouth-like spice. Crafted near the Adriatic Sea.

title: Lansdowne 'Super Plonk'
description: Bright yellow Pet-Nat with tropical, floral, lime-bubbled explosion. Bold, minimal-intervention winemaking.

title: Old Mates Rosé
description: Syrah-based rosé full of personality — pink grapefruit, peach, and cinnamon. Great for dinner or summer sipping.
